General.Name: Kumho HT Inc
General.Description: Kumho HT, Inc produces and sells automotive bulbs, electrical equipment, and LED PCBA modules in Asian countries, North America, and Europe. The company's S25 bulbs include front and rear turn signal, tail/stop, and back-up lamps, as well as daytime running and rear combination lamps. It also provides head position and fog lamps; wedge bulbs comprise dashboard/door courtesy, position/license, map, room/high mounted stop, and overhead console/backup/rear combination lamps; festoon bulbs comprising map and room/luggage/glove box/sun visor/door courtesy lamps; and halogen bulbs comprising head lights and fog lamps. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Gwangju, South Korea.
